sentences.en: Cut into streaky pork thin slice, bean curd slice, bottom go into boil of pot in.
sentences.cn: 将五花肉切成薄片, 豆腐切片, 下入煮沸的锅中.

sentences.en: He is always nervous and streaky about the final exam.
sentences.cn: 他对大考总是感到放心不下的.

sentences.en: In the process of producing polyester compound fabric, streaky warp is easy to be appeared.
sentences.cn: 涤纶复合丝织物在生产过程中很容易出现经柳病疵.

sentences.en: She has streaky fair hair and blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 她有一双蓝色的眼睛，头上有一缕缕的金发。

sentences.en: Streaky pork salted with apricot and honey for 48 hours in advance before roasting.
sentences.cn: 油脂分布均匀的金华肉,与杏桃和蜂蜜腌制48小时后,闷烤出甘鲜肉汁.

sentences.en: The dress has faded so much that the color is streaky.
sentences.cn: 这件衣服褪色得很厉害,所以颜色都不均匀了.

sentences.en: The dye hadn't worked well, and had left her hair rather streaky.
sentences.cn: 染发剂效果不好, 因而早已致使她的头发参差不齐.

sentences.en: The effects of antioxidants on lipid oxidation of vacuum packaged irradiated cooked streaky pork were studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了几种抗氧化剂对真空包装辐照熟五花肉中脂肪氧化的影响.

sentences.en: The wallpaper was streaky with grease.
Wash your dirty streaky face, Johnny.
sentences.cn: 洗你那脏的有了泥条的脸去, 琼尼.

words.tran_cn: 在…上加条纹；（闪电等）闪亮；飞跑（streak的过去分词形式）
有条纹的；有斑点的；容易变的；焦躁不安的

trans.tran_cn: 有斑点的，有条纹的，容易变的
